controller

Class EconomyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.EconomyController

  • public class EconomyController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the Economy part. Controls the communication between GUIs of the Economy part and DAOs connected to them.
    Author:
    Lena, Anni

    • Method Detail

      • updateTransferAmount

        public void updateTransferAmount(Transfer editedTransfer)
        Method for updating a transfer's amount, calls the updateBalanceAmount method after updating the transfer
        Parameters:
        Transfer - with the changed amount

      • updateTransfer

        public boolean updateTransfer(Transfer editedTransfer)
        Method for updating a transfer, gets called if the date or the description of the transfer has been modified
        Parameters:
        editedTransfer - that need to be updated
        Returns:
        true if the transfer was successfully updated, false if updating the transfer didn't succeed

      • getBalance

        public void getBalance()
        Method that gets balance amount from BalanceDAO and gives it forward to BalanceOverviewGUI to display it on the page. If the balance is 0, meaning it was automatically set to 0 with the first usage of the app, a form for setting the right balance is displayed.

      • updateBalance

        public void updateBalance(float amount)
        Method that gets balance amount from BalanceOverviewGUI and gives it forward to BalanceDAO to update in the database.
        Parameters:
        amount - float amount of the new balance

      • incomeCategoriesList

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> incomeCategoriesList()
        Method that gets income Categories from CategoryDAO and makes a list containing categories' names only
        Returns:
        names - ObservableList list of income categories' names

      • expenseCategoriesList

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> expenseCategoriesList()
        Method that gets expense Categories from CategoryDAO and makes a list containing categories' names only
        Returns:
        names - ObservableList list of expense categories' names

      • saveTransfer

        public void saveTransfer(ITransferAddGUI gui)
        Method that gets new transfer's detail from an addTransferGUI and gives the transfer to TransferDAO
        Parameters:
        gui - - ITransferAddGUI class implementation

      • getSelectedTransfers

        public void getSelectedTransfers(AbstractEconomyGUI gui,
                                 java.sql.Date start,
                                 java.sql.Date end)
        Method that gets selected transfers from database and gives them forward to GUI to display in the table
        Parameters:
        gui - AbstractEconomyGUI implementation
        start - Date the start date of the time span from which the transfers are chosen
        end - Date the end date of the time span from which the transfers are chosen

      • removeTransfer

        public void removeTransfer(ITransferGUI gui)
        Method that gets the selected transfer from ITransferAddGUI, tells TransferDAO to delete the transfer from the database and ITransferAddGUI to delete it from the tableView.
        Parameters:
        gui - - ITransferAddGUI class implementation

      • saveNewSaving

        public void saveNewSaving()
        Method that gets new saving's detail from economyAddSavingGUI and gives the saving to SavingDAO

        Method that gets Savings from SavingDAO and makes a list containing savings' details
        Returns:
        Savings[] list of savings

      • removeSaving

        public void removeSaving()
        Method that gets the selected saving from SavingGUI, tells SavingDAO to delete the saving goal from the database and SavingGUI to delete it from the tableView.

      • updateSaving

        public boolean updateSaving(Saving editedSavingDesc)
        Boolean method that updates the saving in the database
        Parameters:
        Saving - to update in the database
        Returns:
        true if the saving was updates successfully, false if the updating of the saving didn't succeed

      • getBalanceAmount

        public float getBalanceAmount()
        Method that gets balance amount from BalanceDAO and gives it forward to BalanceOverviewGUI to display it on the page
        Returns:
        float the balance amount from the database read by BalanceDAO

      • updateBalanceAmount

        public boolean updateBalanceAmount(float amount)
        Boolean method that updates the balance amount
        Parameters:
        amount - that will be taken from or added to the balance
        Returns:
        true if the balance was updates successfully, false if the updating of the balance didn't succeed

      • enoughBalance

        public boolean enoughBalance(float amount)
        Boolean method that there is enough money on the balance to create or update a Transfer or a Saving
        Parameters:
        amount - - amount that will be taken from the balance
        Returns:
        true if the balance is enough, false if there is not enough money on the balance for the change

      • getSavingsList

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getSavingsList()
        Method that gets Savings from SavingDAO and makes a list containing savings' descriptions only
        Returns:
        names - ObservableList list of savings' descriptions

      • getSaving

        public Saving getSaving(java.lang.String description)
        Method that gets a saving description as the parameter and gives it forward to SavingsDAO to search for a saving with this description in the database
        Parameters:
        description - - the description of a saving goal
        Returns:
        saving - the found Saving from the database

      • moveSavingToExpense

        public void moveSavingToExpense(Saving achievedSaving)
        Boolean method that makes an income and an expence from a saving. The saving is also removed from the database. This method gets called if a saving goal is achieved and user wants to mark that he's spent this money for this goal
        Parameters:
        achievedSaving - - the achieved Saving that should be deleted from the database

      • fromSavingToIncome

        public boolean fromSavingToIncome(Saving achievedSaving)
        Boolean method that makes an income Transfer using a saving's data. This method gets called if a saving goal is achieved and user wants to mark that he has spent this money for this goal If there is no needed Category yet (Category with name "savings"), CategoryDAO will create a Category with this name. TransferDAO creates a new income Transfer.
        Parameters:
        achievedSaving - the achieved Saving which data will be used for creating the expense transfer
        Returns:
        true if the transfer creating succeeded, false if the creation of transfer didn't succeed

      • fromSavingToExpense

        public boolean fromSavingToExpense(Saving achievedSaving)
        Boolean method that makes an expense Transfer using a saving's data. This method gets called if a saving goal is achieved and user wants to mark that he has spent this money for this goal If there is no needed Category yet (Category with name "achieved saving goal"), CategoryDAO will create a Category with this name. TransferDAO creates a new expense Transfer.
        Parameters:
        achievedSaving - the achieved Saving which data will be used for creating the expense transfer
        Returns:
        true if the transfer creating succeeded, false if the creation of transfer didn't succeed
